ovdesc.p: IMPORT.FILE.DETAILS may be set up only in the import area.The files are copied from the export area to the import area on verifing this record.

desc.p: Can be used to attach a routine, which will be executed prior to the importing of files. An entry in the PGM.FILE with type 'S' is checked. Upto 35 characters are allowed.
Specify the password of the area where the data has to be copied. Mandatory field. Upto 35 characters are allowed.
Specify the login id of the area where the data has to be copied. Mandatory field . Upto 35 characters are allowed.
The directory path in which the files to be copied are available. Upto 35 characters are allowed.
Specify the ip address of the server of the area where the data has to be copied . Mandatory Field. Upto 35 characters are allowed.
Any ID with Alpha-Numeric values . Upto 20 characters are allowed.
The names of the files that are to be copied. Mandatory Field. Upto 55 characters are allowed. Eg : COMP.FBNK.COMPARE.DIFFERENCES
The directory path (current area) to which the files are to be copied. Upto 35 characters are allowed.
Can be used to attach a routine, which will be executed after the files are imported . An entry in the PGM.FILE with type 'S' is checked. Upto 35 characters are allowed.
